page.title: 08GENERAL ELECTRIC COMPANY
page.content: G.E.C Main Works site, Stafford. Built in 1904 and covers 37,160 sq metres. Consists of thirteen companies:- GEC Turbine Generators GEC Foundry GEC Stafford Laboratories GEC High Voltage Switchgear GEC Power Transformers GEC Distribution Services GEC Transmission and Distribution Projects Ltd GEC Site Services GEC Mechanical Labs GEC Ceramics Stanhope Pension Trust GEC Head Office Accounts GEC Midland Computers Employs approximately 3,500 people. Makes heavy electrical equipment:- generators transformers switchgear metal castings control panels distribution systems
